features: VERSATILE FOR TRAVEL & HOSPITALITY - Eco Amenities provides bulk amenity packs for a variety of uses: great for hotels or motels, inns, AirBnBs, VRBOs, vacation rentals, guest bedrooms, resorts, bed & breakfasts, offices, gyms, spas, etc.

100 PIECE VALUE PACK - Included are 100 easy-tear sachets (10ml / 0.35fl oz each) of individually packaged mini shampoo and conditioner, representing a great value for money! Cost effective for the buyer, and also a great refreshing experience for the users

TRAVEL SIZED TOILETRIES - Packed in small, individually packs that are leak proof, durable and preserve freshness. The TSA approved individual packaging allows for easy transport - convenient to fit inside a purse or your carry-on luggage. The shampoo is suitable for all hair patterns and styles

NATURAL, REFRESHING & CRUELTY-FREE - The unisex shampoo has a mild green tea scent to delight the senses, and does not contain paraben or harsh chemicals/additives that can irritate the skin. Specially formulated to refresh and invigorate, our eco toiletries are never tested on animals
POPULAR FOR DONATIONS & CHURCH - Great idea for giveaways, donations, hospital, church convocation, homeless care package and more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for quality
reviews.reviewText: Used it for my short term rental and guests never complained. Great quality vs price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Went to a hotel in Nashville that provided this shampoo. Loved it! Looked online, and found it here on Amazon. Small packets, not too expensive. My hair is awesome with this. Sometimes go 3-4 days between washings. Never happened before. Sudsy and smells nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for one time use
reviews.reviewText: The product is perfect for hotel use. No wasteEasy to discard.Pricing is out of this world perfect.Less waste, the product smells good. And our guests are not complaining.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the money, I’m using for the rental apartment is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is a good product, but not easy to open
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these to put in bags with other items for distribution to those in need. I tried the shampoo in the shower, and found the smell nice and not too perfumed. However, I had trouble finding where and how to open them, especially under running water (maybe opening them beforehand and with scissors would have been smarter). I managed to tear the packet open a wee bit but it didn't want to go further. I don't see people with disabilities or the elderly being able to use these without scissors. The second issue for me is that my hair is almost down to my shoulders and one packet didn't cover my hair. Anyone with longish hair and/or very thick hair would need at least 2 packets per shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy for our homeless ministry.
reviews.reviewText: These are wonderful and very useful for our homeless ministry. All items we give the people in the streets must fit in their backpacks and this is perfect. You get a lot for your money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for traveling.
reviews.reviewText: Good for the price. Actually smells good and feels good for my hair. Doesn’t make me itch when I use it for my trip abroad. Cause some shampoo/conditioner does.
